post.title: jquery-validation ReDoS
post.content:
Summary

Exponential ReDoS in jquery-validation leads to denial of service

Component

jquery-validation

Affected versions

jquery-validation (,1.19.3], fixed in 1.19.4

Description

An exponential ReDoS (Regular Expression Denial of Service) can be triggered in the jquery-validation npm package, when an attacker is able to supply arbitrary input to the url2 method

PoC

'[FTP://0](ftp://0.0.0.0/).' + '3.3.'.repeat(10) + '\x00'

Vulnerability Mitigations

No mitigations are supplied for this issue

References

NVD
post.description: CVE-2021-43306 Medium severity. Exponential ReDoS in jquery-validation leads to denial of service
